decisions.what: Disabled initial order deprecation for MR and KN brands to unblock Charge at Checkout
decisions.context: Initial order deprecation was blocking Charge at Checkout because Payments wasn't receiving required Description field from intfood

decisions.what: Switched support workflow from green button to Slack Commander using /new_issue and /new_question commands
decisions.context: Moving to a more powerful and well-known tool for Good Chop squad support requests

decisions.what: Disabled KRS (recurring selection) on staging due to issues
decisions.context: Issue detected related to recurring selection functionality

decisions.what: Corrected redirect direction for 2026 Direct Mail landing pages
decisions.context: Initial request had redirects backwards - should go from goodchop.com to get.goodchop.com, not the reverse

entities.name: MR and KN
entities.context: Brands affected by initial order deprecation blocking Charge at Checkout

entities.name: Plans Squad
entities.context: Squad that enabled initial orders and will fix Description field issue

entities.name: U03EN3N4KM4 (Pamela)
entities.context: Handled redirect implementation for 2026 Direct Mail landing pages

entities.name: U09JSMTMA5A
entities.context: Requested redirects for Direct Mail landing pages and Slack channel creation

entities.name: U01B2LBUPND
entities.context: Fixed trial-box menu configuration in CCM and performed bulk migration of 11k subscriptions

entities.name: Milemarker Agency
entities.context: External agency partners for Slack channel collaboration

entities.name: FTCP cluster
entities.context: 30% of live PCS traffic being switched to this cluster

entities.name: Payments
entities.context: System that requires Description field from intfood for Charge at Checkout

blockers.description: Initial order deprecation blocking Charge at Checkout for MR and KN due to missing Description field from intfood to Payments
blockers.impact: Charge at Checkout functionality for MR and KN brands

blockers.description: Trial-box menus not configured in CCM for weeks 2026-W01 and 2026-W02
blockers.impact: Customers unable to select trial box menus for those weeks

blockers.description: Issue with recurring selection (KRS) on staging

action_items.task: Validate that first order creation on cut-off works as expected on staging for newly created GoC subscriptions
Plans Squad to fix Description field issue for Charge at Checkout compatibility
Implement redirects for 2026 Direct Mail landing pages
Create Slack channel with external agency partners
Bulk migration of 11k Good Chop subscriptions
Monitor 30% PCS traffic switch to FTCP cluster

key_context.summary: Enabling initial order deprecation on staging for GoC revealed incompatibility with Charge at Checkout for MR and KN brands due to missing Description field. Plans Squad temporarily re-enabled initial orders and will fix the underlying issue.
key_context.relevance: Critical for checkout functionality across multiple brands and affects staging validation

key_context.summary: Redirects configured for 13 monthly landing pages (mymove, jan26-dec26) from goodchop.com to get.goodchop.com for tracking purposes. Previous years' redirects maintained for historical tracking.
key_context.relevance: Supports year-long marketing campaign with proper URL tracking infrastructure

key_context.summary: CCM was missing trial-box menu configurations for weeks 2026-W01 and 2026-W02, causing customer selection issues and alerts. Issue was identified and fixed.
key_context.relevance: Affects customer experience and subscription onboarding for trial customers

key_context.summary: Good Chop squad transitioned from custom Slack workflow button to Slack Commander using /new_issue and /new_question commands for support requests.
key_context.relevance: Changes how team receives and processes support requests, affects all stakeholders

key_context.summary: 30% of live PCS traffic being migrated to FTCP cluster, and 11k Good Chop subscriptions undergoing bulk migration.
key_context.relevance: Significant infrastructure changes that could impact service stability and require monitoring

summary: Good Chop squad addressed multiple technical issues including initial order deprecation blocking Charge at Checkout, missing trial-box menus in CCM, and implemented 2026 Direct Mail redirects. The team also transitioned support workflows to Slack Commander and is managing infrastructure migrations.
